title: Chamunda Mata Temple
description: A sacred temple dedicated to Chamunda Mata, located in the Mehrangarh Fort, offering panoramic views of Jodhpur.

title: Clock Tower
description: A famous landmark in Jodhpur, this vibrant clock tower is located in the heart of the bustling Sardar Market.

title: Jaswant Thada
description: A stunning marble cenotaph built in memory of Maharaja Jaswant Singh II, offering serene views of the surrounding city.

title: Mandore Garden
description: An ancient garden known for its cenotaphs of former rulers, beautiful architecture, and a peaceful environment.

title: Mehrangarh Fort
description: One of the largest forts in India, Mehrangarh Fort is a symbol of Rajasthan's rich history and offers breathtaking views of the blue city.

title: Mahamandir Temple
description: An ancient temple known for its intricate carvings and beautiful architecture, dedicated to Lord Shiva.

title: Rao Jodha Desert Rock Park
description: A unique park showcasing the natural beauty of the Thar Desert’s ecosystem, located at the foot of Mehrangarh Fort.

title: Rao Jodha Statue
description: A statue honoring Rao Jodha, the founder of Jodhpur, located near Mehrangarh Fort.

title: Toorji Ka Jhalara (Stepwell)
description: A historic stepwell that reflects the rich heritage of Rajasthan’s architecture and is a serene spot to visit in Jodhpur.
